name: Stunt Simulator Multiplayer
description: Choose a car, perform amazing stunts and drifts, collect as many points you can get and buy the rest of the cars.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E6600/AMD Phenom X3 8750 Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 260/Radeon HD 4870 DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 512 MB available space
